name: Cube Attack!
description:
Fight to survive and rack up a high score in Cube Attack! Defend yourself from evil cubes bent on your destruction. Comment  your high score to be added to the leader boards!  This game was made by Bomb_lobber_500.

This was my first blender game. WikidClix taught me a good portion of what I know in blender :) Be sure to check out his profile on itch.io!

The music and sound effects are from the YouTube audio library and Soundjay.com.

Enemies: 

Red cubes 3 hit kill,

Blue cubes 5 hit kill,

light green cube 3 hit kill. (moves fast and is slightly smaller)

Controls: 

Click to shoot.

Hold down shift to dash.

Move your mouse to look around.

WASD to move.

Collect the blue cylinder regain ammo.
